Detailed Description

A class for indicating that a plug-in utilizes the trial period activation policy.

This class is used to indicate that plug-in is enabled if the number of days since the first run of DAZ Studio with the plug-in installed is less than the specified number of trial days. See the documentation of DzPlugin for a description of how to easily implement and provide activation policies in a DAZ Studio plug-in.
